column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday July 7 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: Traffic signals are dark at numerous intersections in Lexington.
If traffic lights are dark, treat the intersection as a 4 way stop. Come to a FULL stop, proceed with caution. If police are present, follow their directions.
Reports of downed electrical wires in many areas of Lexington and Fayette Co.
If you see a downed wire, DO NOT approach it.
Currently in effect and until 7 p.m. EDT.
